created_by: Victor Sergeev, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, Gleb Sukhodolskiy, Timur Zinniatullin, oscd.community, Tim Shelton, frack113 (split)
name: WinSock2 Autorun Keys Modification
description: Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry.
false_positives: Legitimate software automatically (mostly, during installation) sets up autorun keys for legitimate reason
Legitimate administrator sets up autorun keys for legitimate reason
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:/[Ss][Ee][Tt][Vv][Aa][Ll][Uu][Ee]/ AND registry.path:/.*\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll][Ss][Ee][Tt]\\[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee][Ss]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ss][Oo][Cc][Kk]2\\[Pp][Aa][Rr][Aa][Mm][Ee][Tt][Ee][Rr][Ss].*/ AND registry.path:(/.*\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Tt][Oo][Cc][Oo][Ll]_[Cc][Aa][Tt][Aa][Ll][Oo][Gg]9\\[Cc][Aa][Tt][Aa][Ll][Oo][Gg]_[Ee][Nn][Tt][Rr][Ii][Ee][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Nn][Aa][Mm][Ee][Ss][Pp][Aa][Cc][Ee]_[Cc][Aa][Tt][Aa][Ll][Oo][Gg]5\\[Cc][Aa][Tt][Aa][Ll][Oo][Gg]_[Ee][Nn][Tt][Rr][Ii][Ee][Ss].*/)) AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.Details:/\([Ee][Mm][Pp][Tt][Yy]\)/ OR process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Mm][Ss][Ii][Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Ww][Oo][Ww]64\\[Mm][Ss][Ii][Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((winlog.event_data.EventType:SetValue AND registry.path:*\\System\\CurrentControlSet\\Services\\WinSock2\\Parameters* AND registry.path:(*\\Protocol_Catalog9\\Catalog_Entries* OR *\\NameSpace_Catalog5\\Catalog_Entries*)) AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.Details:\(Empty\) OR process.executable:C\:\\Windows\\System32\\MsiExec.exe OR process.executable:C\:\\Windows\\syswow64\\MsiExec.exe)))`
